description: The construction of a single storey rear extension including the replacement of the first floor rear windows together with the installation of double doors and a side light.
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s): Plans as Proposed, Brentham Garden Estate French Door Joinery Details (JAMB), Brentham Garden Estate French Door Joinery Details (MEETING STILES), Brentham Garden Estate French Door Joinery Details (SILL), Brentham Garden Estate French Door Joinery Details (TRANSOM), Brentham Garden Estate French Door Joinery Details (HEAD and GLAZING BAR) Brentham Garden Estate Window Joinery Details (SILL), Brentham Garden Estate Window Joinery Details (TRANSOM), Brentham Garden Estate Window Joinery Details (HEAD and GLAZING BAR), Brentham Garden Estate Window Joinery Details (MULLION), Brentham Garden Estate Window Joinery Details (JAMB and GLAZING BAR)  Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall be those described on the Plan titled 'Plans as Proposed'. 	 Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Adopted Development Management Plan (2013) and policy 1.1 and 1.2(f) and (g) of the Adopted Ealing Local Development Framework Core Strategy (2012) and policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7.8 of the London Plan (2015).
